overview:
Amanda is Director of AWIC (http://www.awic.co.uk). She has 15 years experience in IT operations and programme management, gained in the financial services, biotech and software industries.

Prior to joining AWIC, she was infrastructure manager at a global financial services company, building strong technical teams, managing organisational change and IT transformation.

She has managed corporate IT for firms such as Pogo.com (Electronic Arts) and MSCI Barra and high performance compute farms for computational biology labs in the US and UK.

A Chartered IT Professional, with ITIL and PRINCE2 certifications, Amanda holds a BA from UC Berkeley. She is an active member of Women in Technology and proponent of sustainable IT.
